page.title: 19Children's Interests.
page.content: Children spend their free time in many exciting ways:{Collecting}(stamps, key rings, coins, cards...);{Model-making; {BMX-stunt-cycling; Roller-skating; Pop {Music; horse-riding; home-computers; {Sports;}& many others. Here is one popular hobby examined in more detail. *************{DANCING}**************** In the 1980's {Break-dance} is very popular (mainly among boys). They jerk their bodies to music. There is also a lot of dancing on T.V.{ TAP DANCING needs a shoe with metal on the heel & tip so it makes a loud tapping sound. { MODERN}is mainly dance exercises for strengthening your muscles & stretch- ing your tendons. {BALLET }is very different from other dancing. The muscles have to be very loose but strong. Special satin or leather shoes are needed. In{DISCO dancing}you just move to the music any way you want.{
